Unzip and load the file

```{r}
unzip("activity.zip")
activity <- read.csv("activity.csv")
colnames(activity)
```

Transform the date into date format.

```{r}
activity$date <- as.Date(activity$date, format="%Y-%m-%d")
class(activity$date)
```
